title: In game connection issues
body: Basically this started happening 3 days ago where once in a game i would get the message "Attempting to reconnect" and it would go away after 15 seconds. Now this happens every 1 min and after i restart lol and connect back to the game, the message will popup as soon as i connect and it would disonnect me. I already got 2 leaverbuster punishments out of that. Really annoying. Fix this thing because i dont wanna waste 3 hours of my life waiting for a game just because of the game's problems

replies.body:
Since the connection error occurs fairly consistently when you play, there seems to be an issue with your computer maintaining a stable and consistent connection to the individual Game Server.  From the sounds of it, it seems like Packet Loss is the most likely cuplrit as it usually pops the reconnect screen.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has the most common solutions that should get rid of this issue.

If the issue doesn't go away, reply back and let me know!
this isnt true at all everything on my end is fine and my ISP said everything is clear as day for me but only YOUR game gives me the issue and your tech support told me it was my ISP
same here. Also it would be tooo much of a big coinsidence that after 6.9 released, forum is overflowing with people complainig about lag spikes

Don't understand it hopefully its just a server malfunction and its resolved... Riot tech support hasnt helped me one bit and just told me its my ISP and its not at all i actually just had a guy here and said my ping on everything else is fine it has to be the receiving server.. plus like you said since 6.9 lots of connection issues.

I can't speak to what the Specialist told you in your ticket, given that they have had a chance to work with you one-on-one and go over logs.  

However, this does not appear to an issue isolated to the individual game server.  If this was indeed an issue on the game server end, then all 10 players in every single match would be experiencing the issue, since they are all connecting to the same exact server.  Given that this is not happening, then we need to look at other possible root causes.

The best advice I can offer is to keep working with the Tech Specialist in your ticket!  They will continue to work with you in order to find a solution.
they told me to contact my isp and thats all i heard

I have a same issue too. I crashed game many time which never happened before patch. I though it maybe my client, but it seem not because i checked it and everything work well except the game. i came here to hope find the solution, but it seem even Riot doesnt know what happen. Im so disappointed.
I'm having the same exact issues bruh, I keep thinking its my wifi but everytime I check it, it says it's connected so that's fine. it only happens on league though.
